 Solar Panels








(Actual customer bill)



   





How Would You Like Your PG&E Bill To Look Like This After 12 Months Of Energy Usage?
(-$34.41)









 The SunPower Advantage















 Not all solar panels are created equal





Designed by SunPower, Maxeon®️ solar cell technology makes more energy from every drop of sunshine. Factor in our elegant styling and impressive durability, and it’s no wonder we outshine the rest.



 








 Why Choose SunPower?








 




 Smarter solutions from a single company


Unlike conventional systems, we design and protect your entire system from consultation to installation and beyond. One company. One solution. One warranty. We’ve also made it easy to integrate battery storage. So when you’re ready to add solar storage—so you can power your home in a grid outage or reduce peak-time electricity costs—we’ve got you covered there too.









 SunPower makes it easy


We pioneered a new customer experience for a world of social distancing. One of our solar experts will walk you through the entire process on your phone, tablet, or computer, using our innovative design and satellite imagery tools. And if you move forward with solar, the installation is completely contact-free. Since most of our work is done on your roof or in your garage, it is unlikely that we will need to enter your home.





 








 




 Better solar. Better savings. Better warranty.


All solar systems are not created equal. The more electricity you produce in the least amount of space, the greater your savings. And SunPower has the most powerful and efficient home solar systems in the market—all backed by the industry’s most comprehensive warranty.









 There’s never been a better time.


Going solar is more practical, reliable and cost effective than ever. With $0 down solar financing, you can start saving with little to no upfront costs and you may qualify for federal solar tax credits.



  Yes! I want to take the survey to reserve my rebates! 










 Take our 30 Second Survey to see if you qualify for a $3000 instant electric utility paid rebate to upgrade your insulation!


  Yes! I want to take the survey to reserve my rebates!

Back-up Battery Storage $13,000 to $26,000 Rebate
Solar Federal Tax Credits $2,600 to $14,371
$500 Federal Tax Credit for Windows and Insulation
$3000 Instant Utility paid Rebate to convert gas HVAC to electric
$2500 Instant Utility paid Rebate to upgrade electrical panel
Net Metering so solar will turn your meter backward
Take the survey to see what you can qualify for while these funds are still available!
